product_overview: The AI Resume Interview System is a web application that leverages AI to enhance recruitment and interview preparation processes. It allows users to upload resumes, receive AI-generated interview questions tailored to job roles, and get AI-driven answer evaluations. The system also offers ATS compatibility checks and an admin dashboard for insights and reporting, all delivered with a modern, professional, and accessible user interface.
core_goals: Enable seamless user authentication with role-based access control for admins and users.
Allow users to upload PDF resumes and extract relevant text for AI analysis.
Generate personalized interview questions based on uploaded resumes and selected job roles.
Provide AI-powered evaluation and detailed feedback on users' interview answers.
Perform Applicant Tracking System (ATS) compatibility analysis with skill gap identification and recommendations.
Offer an admin dashboard for user management, analytics, and report generation.
Deliver a modern, responsive, and accessible UI/UX consistent across devices and compliant with WCAG 2.1 standards.
key_features: User Authentication system with secure login, registration, and session management supporting admin and user roles.
Resume upload functionality with PDF text extraction and AI-powered analysis for job role matching.
AI Interview Questions Generation tailored to resume content and job roles.
Answer Evaluation feature using AI to score and provide feedback on user responses.
ATS Score Analysis providing compatibility scoring and skill gap recommendations.
Admin Dashboard featuring user data visualization, analytics, and PDF report downloads.
Comprehensive UI/UX redesign including card-based layouts, gradient backgrounds, icons integration, and accessibility enhancements.
Responsive design ensuring optimal usability on mobile, tablet, and desktop devices.
Enhanced JavaScript components including speech recognition error handling, drag-and-drop file uploads, and accessible modals.
user_flow_summary: User registers or logs in via the authentication system with role-based access controls.
Upon login, user uploads resume PDF, specifying job role and preferences (number of questions, inclusion of HR questions).
System extracts resume text and performs AI analysis to generate personalized interview questions.
User views and answers generated interview questions with AI evaluation providing detailed feedback and scoring.
Users can perform an ATS compatibility check on their resume with skill gap analysis results.
Admin users access the dashboard to view user analytics, generate reports, and download PDF summaries.
Throughout the platform, users experience a modern, accessible, and responsive UI optimized for all devices.
validation_criteria: Successful user authentication with role-based access verified through registration, login, and logout processes.
Accurate PDF resume upload handling and text extraction resulting in relevant AI-driven analysis.
Generation of interview questions that reflect uploaded resume data and selected job roles.
Accurate AI evaluation of user-submitted answers with detailed feedback and scoring delivered promptly.
Correct ATS compatibility scoring with actionable skill gap recommendations provided.
Admin dashboard data displays user analytics accurately and allows PDF report downloads.
UI adheres to the redesigned design system with consistent color palette, typography, spacing, and accessibility features.
Responsive design behaves consistently across major devices: mobile, tablet, and desktop.
JavaScript enhancements like speech recognition and drag-and-drop file uploads function reliably with proper error handling.
